summary: At Oxford University, a professor and a grad student work together to try to stop a potential series of murders seemingly linked by mathematical symbols.
cast: Elijah Wood|John Hurt|Leonor Watling|Julie Cox|Jim Carter|Alex Cox|Burn Gorman|Dominique Pinon|Anna Massey|Danny Sapani|Alan David|Tim Wallers|James Weber Brown|Ian East|Charlotte Asprey|Tom Frederic|John Foley|Michael Mears|James Howard|Luing Andrews|Sarah Crowden|Bruce Jamieson|Thomas Snowdon|Duane Henry|John Wark|Bill Weston|Roque Baños|Joyce Datiles|Nigel Martin Davey|James Fiddy|Jamie Langlands|Shane Nolan|Richard Smith|John Snowden|Simon Steggall|Naomi Westerman
director: Director: Álex de la Iglesia (as Alex de la Iglesia)
title: Los crímenes de Oxford
